long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you always seem to have links you wanna save for a specific reason, but don't want to clog up your bookmarks with links you won't need in a week?

Well look no further! I present Burning Links, a way to simply save links on a timer, and once they've expired, they're gone! No dealing with the endless sifting through & deleting of bookmarks.
